resources.string: Click on the ❓ for mor details

To this awesome App!
 You're on the right way to safely keep your most important things (the access data to all of your accounts) right next to you in your pocket.
 This App lets you do this in a nice and easy way. I (the developer) hope you enjoy this app the little time you going to use it.
 In the next step you have to setup your master password so don't wait and hit "setup"
To get help by choosing the right values click the ?-button
If you don\'t enter a PIM it will keep the calculated.
In this view you can see your password and the correlating PIM. You can keep the PIM or change it, but be careful!
To get help by choosing the right password click the ❓
Your entered PIM seems to be a bit low! You should use a 5 digit number between 20000 and 30000. Check help if you\'re not sure.
Your entered PIM seems to be a bit high! If you choose a high PIM the app may slow down significantly. Check help if you\'re not sure.
Your password doesn\'t seem to be safe enough! Check help for more information.
Error during setup. Please try again. If it still fails, please select another password.
In this app you can easily store all of your passwords. You may know this because the small description from this app and the PlayStore site already told you.
To store your passwords this app uses an 256bit encrypted database which is state of the art of encrypting files.
Here may be some more text but I\'m to lazy to write even more text.

First of all you have to ask this few questions:\n\t1.\tIs the password \"burtforcable\". This means can it be guessed by trying all possibilities. This happens if your password has less than 8 characters and has not much diversity. (This is what called entropy, which is the little view beneath the password input, which will be there some time in the future).\n \t2.\tMay your password appear in some password dictionaries. These dictionaries are leaked password databases from some companies which got hacked by some bad guys. If your password is pretty simple it may appear in one of these dictionaries and can be guessed easily.
So choosing \"password\" as password is pretty bad. Also \"password123\" is not good.

Now how to choose a good password? First way is to choose three to four random words which (and this is important) are not so common to speak or write. If you choose a password like this your password is long enough not to be brutforced and is not this likely to be found in a dictionary.\nSounds good, doesn\'t it?

To get an even better password (and annoy almost everyone) just put an underscore (\"_\") right in the middle of your word sequence. Or an ampersand (\"&\") right in the middle of a word like \"horse\" becomes \"ho&rse\".

And the second way is the old fashioned way to choose a password. Choose randomly more (a lot more) than 8 upper and lower case letters, some digits and special characters. This way your password is hard to brutforce and the possibility to find this in a password dictionary is pretty low.\n Of course these passwords are hard to remember, so don\'t forget it.
So this little help is supposed to help you to find the right password.

Because you are an expert you probably know how to choose a password. If you don\'t know here\'s the TL;DR version:\n\t1.\tChoose a password with a high entropy. So many different characters in your password so it cannot be brutforced easily.\n\t2.\tYour password should be unique so it doesn\'t appear in any password dictionary. If you choose words as password, select 4 random uncommon words and put a special character like & or an underscore \'_\' somewhere in your password.

So what\'s this PIM?\nPIM stands for \"Personal Iterations Multiplier\" and is a simple number. This number is used by the generation for the final password to encrypt the database. So it\'s the number of iterations used for the key derivation.

If you choose your own PIM it should be a five digit number between 20,000 and 30,000. Though the developer of the encrypted database library says on his website if a password is set the PIM should be about 10000. But to provide more security the generated and your selected PIM should be a little bit higher. But the PIM shouldn\'t be to high because the login and setup will take ages and you won\'t have a good experience and using the app will be annoying.
